Sweat and spicy spells from the ovens float around the room.
A thin layer of flour coats the floor.
Delicious smells can be detected from the cooking area.
Your mouth begins to water just being here.
You can almost taste all the great smells in here.
Tools, workbenches, and other clutter make it hard to get around.
Price tags seem to hang off everything. Is this a garage sale?
You feel like this probably a honest place to shop.
The way the light catches the merchandise makes your wallet feel heavier.
There`s so much here you feel you could probably spend all day.
You don`t suppose this place gets visitors every day.
By the footprints on the floor, you guess this place sees lots of patrons.
The store is quaint and rustic, and it appears everything is bad on-premises.
The shop seems decorated rather exoticly for such mundane wares.

ROOM.DESCRIPTION:
You are wandering around the ${c:areaname} park. Seeing the sky through the trees makes you feel glorious. ${c:adj_beautiful} trees and shrubs surround you at every step.

You are strolling through ${c:areaname} park. The sky above and the fresh air do you good. ${c:adj_beautiful} trees and shrubs surround you at every step.

You are walking around in ${c:areaname} park. There doesn't appear to be any clear paths through the trees.

You are in ${c:areaname} park. There are $adj_lots of trees and $adj_lots of bushes and $adj_lots of grass and dirt underfoot.

You are in ${c:areaname} park. There are $adj_lots of trees and $adj_lots of bushes. Also, there is $adj_lots of grass and dirt underfoot.

You are in ${c:areaname} park. There are $adj_lots of trees and $adj_lots of bushes. There is $adj_lots of grass and dirt underfoot.

You are in ${c:areaname} park. There are $adj_lots of trees and $adj_lots of bushes. Grass and dirt are underfoot.

You are walking around in ${c:areaname} park. The sky through the trees makes you feel $adj_feeling_good. There is $adj_lots of grass and dirt underfoot.

You are strolling through ${c:areaname} park. ${c:adj_beautiful} trees and shrubs surround you at every step.

You are wandering around the ${c:areaname} park. ${c:adj_beautiful} trees and shrubs surround you at every step.

You are walking around in ${c:areaname} park. There are $adj_lots of trees and $adj_lots of bushes and $adj_lots of grass and dirt underfoot. There is also $adj_lots of fresh air.

You are walking around in ${c:areaname} park. ${c:adj_beautiful} trees and shrubs surround you at every step.

You are walking around in ${c:areaname} park. You feel like you could wander around here forever.

There are are horses for sale, and stables for rent to house your own mounts.
Straw covers the floor, and bags of feed sit near a water trough.
The floor is covered in a bed of straw. Feed bags, water buckets, and other tools hang on the walls.
Through the smell and jumble you can see feed bags and other vitals on the hay covered floor.
Everything a growing animal needs is scattered around here, with various implements you can only guess about hanging on the walls.

A sign is hanging above the door.

ROOM.ROOM:
The ${c:areaname} $__cityhalltype ${c:areaname} $__cityhalltype The $__cityhalltype
This is the $adj_fancy, $adj_majestic, $adj_phys_size_large ${c:areaname} $__cityhalltype. The $adj_majestic ${c:areaname} $__cityhalltype is $adj_phys_size_large and $adj_fancy. The $adj_phys_size_large $adj_majestic ${c:areaname} $__cityhalltype is $adj_fancy.
The $adj_majestic markings of officialdom and justice adorn this $adj_light room. The $adj_conservative people here clearly want to be in charge. From the furniture, to the $adj_majestic art, this $adj_light room says $adj_conservative office and justice. The $adj_conservative markings of $adj_majestic officialdom and justice adorn this building. From the $adj_light floors to the $adj_majestic furnishings and all the other $adj_conservative markings of officialdom, you are impressed with this building. All around this $adj_light building is $adj_majestic and $adj_conservative furnishings speaking of authority and justice.
In this building the business of the ${l:__citytype} is done and its judgements made.
Petitioners and ${l:__cityattendant}s go about their activities here. Petitioners line up patiently here, while ${l:__cityattendant}s see to their own business. In one area of the building, petitioners await their opportunity for an audience. Elsewhere, ${l:__cityattendant}s roam about quietly. ${c:__cityattendant}s see to the orderly admission of petitioners for an audience here. Although not a crowded place, there are petitioners and ${l:__cityattendant}s here all the time.
The exit is to the $roomexits_desc_long. The street is to the $roomexits_desc_long. ${c:STAT:ANYROOM:DISPLAY} is to the $roomexits_desc_long.
<MOB class="GenMob" level="30+(($level_range) * 1.1)<91" race="$_humanoid_races" gender="$anygender"> $__chieftype ${c:fantasy_name1}
$mob_name is ready to dispense justice. $mob_name is calling for bids. $mob_name is here.

a ${l:__chieftype}`s uniform $item_name has been left here COTTON TORSO,LEGStrue
